resources.string: ReadMe: where you are right now, gives you all the information.
Main Menu: has options / buttons to add a phone call, look up a phone bill by name, look up phone calls by name and times, or look at the readme again.

Add Phone Call: allows you to add a phone call with a caller, callee, start date/time and end date/time. The am/pm switch is am when off and pm when on. The date is in the format MM/dd/yyyy and the time is in format hh:mm
Look up Phone Bill: allows you to look up a phone bill by name. If we have the phone bill, we will show you it. If not, we will let you know.
Search Phone Bills: allows you to search through phone bills by name and filter said phone bill by start date being between the start and end dates inputted.
